name: Caravan of wishes
description:
SHOOT WITH *SPACE*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

PLEASE GO COMPLETELY FULLSCREEN TO PLAY THIS GAME NORMALLY!!!

The year is 2072. Neo Tokyo and Mankind have recently discovered a new technology allowing you to order positive emotions and desires for only ¥99,000. You work as a caravaneer for a company called "Delivery of wishes." Your job is to immerse yourself in the minds of your clients to deliver positive impulses straight to their brains. Be wary while inside. It's easy to overload yourself with the client's negative emotions, so be on guard as they come after you. While inside the mind world, Anything that affects you there affects your actual body. Making this work deadly. So, ready for your next delivery?

Made by:

Developer/programmer: Ernst Studio

Game designer: ShriGanapati

Sound/Musician: mathbard

Some sprites are from:

https://opengameart.org/content/tileable-dirt-textures

https://opengameart.org/content/freeart-topdown-extras

https://opengameart.org/content/lens-flares-and-particles
